projects.title: 20 Seconds
projects.description: In this game, the bullets will come from different positions of window's edges. You control a plane and should try to avoid being hit by bullets.

projects.title: TongQu
projects.description: This application helps students in my university to take part in activities and manage his activity group.

projects.title: Crossy
projects.description: Students can use Crossy to find school buses, library books, ecard information and course scores.

projects.title: Crossy - Cortex-M3
projects.description: Now Crossy can be used on Cortex-M3 board. The functions are the same as that on iOS.

projects.title: 2015 iGEM - BASE
projects.description: This website helps biology students and professors to make their own biobricks.

projects.title: 2015 Penta-Hackathon - Music player based on face expression
projects.description: This website can play music based on your face expression.

projects.title: Zhihu Picture
projects.description: This plugin can remove all the text information of an answer on Zhihu

projects.title: MultiSense Hotel System
projects.description: This website is made for customers, receptionists and managers. They can book rooms, check-in and check-out, human resource management and benefit analysis.

projects.title: Smart Car Control System
projects.description: The phone with this system can control the smart car by buttons, sounds, gestures and gravity sensor. The smart car will send the image of what it saw to the control phone.
